TitlePage.Title: &D-Modules;
TitlePage.Subtitle: D-Modules and special injective cogenerators
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. The latest version is available online at:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/~barakat/homalg-project/D-Modules/chap0.html
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
This package is part of the &homalg;-project:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/index.php/unreleased/d-modules

TitlePage.Acknowledgements:
I would like to thank Professor Bernard Malgrange for inspiring discussions. The notion InjectivePoints used at several places in the package was suggested by Alban Quadrat in an e-mail correspondence:
Otherwise, I do not know if you cannot play with the concepts of "K-points" and "injective" (e.g., D-Modules).
